FESI.Interpreter
Class Evaluator

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--FESI.Interpreter.Evaluator
public class Evaluator
extends Object

Defines the evaluation interface and contains the evaluation context.

Important: This object is also used as the synchronization object - all entries into the evaluation process must be synchronized on the evaluator, as the inside of the evaluator is not synchronized for speed reasons.

Constructor Summary

          Create a new empty evaluator

evaluateFunction

public ESValue evaluateFunction(ASTStatementList node,
                                EvaluationSource es,
                                ESObject variableObject,
                                Vector localVariableNames,
                                ESObject thisObject)
                         throws EcmaScriptException
subevaluator - Evaluate a function node (inside a program evaluation)
Parameters:
node - The AST node representing the list of statements
es - The evaluation source information for backtracce
localVariableNames - The set of local variable to create
thisObject - The this of this evaluation (so to speak)
Returns:
The last value of the evaluation
Throws:
EmcaScriptException - In case of any error during evaluation

public ESValue evaluateWith(ASTStatement node,
                            ESObject scopeObject,
                            EvaluationSource es)
                     throws EcmaScriptException
Sub evaluator - evaluate a with node (inside a program evaluation)
Parameters:
node - The with statement body
scopeObject - the new scope for this with
es - The evaluation source for back trace
Returns:
The last value of the evaluation
Throws:
EmcaScriptException - In case of any error during evaluation

evaluate

public ESValue evaluate(ParsedProgram program,
                        ESObject thisObject,
                        boolean acceptReturn)
                 throws EcmaScriptException
Top level core evaluator (on parsed program), Must be called from a function synchronized on the evaluator
Parameters:
program - The parsed program information
thisObject - The this of the evaluation (usually the global object)
acceptReturn - If true accept a return statement in the body
Returns:
The last value of the evaluation
Throws:
EmcaScriptException - In case of any error during evaluation

                          ESObject theFunction,
                          Object[] args)
                   throws EcmaScriptException
subevaluator - Evaluate an event function - must be synchronized
Parameters:
sourceObject - The source of the event (wrapped)
theFunction - The function to call
args - The arguments of the event
Throws:
EmcaScriptException - In case of any error during evaluation

                        ESObject thisObject,
                        boolean returnAccepted)
                 throws EcmaScriptException
